page.title: 17The Womens'Institute
page.content: W.I stands for Womens'Institute. It is a place where ladies meet to discuss different matters of interest to them. It also gives them chance to meet their friends. In an area like ours, it's important, because the houses are scattered and that doesn't always give you a chance to meet people. The W.I. meets on the first Tuesday of every month. It is mainly held at the Village Hall. They have people round to talk to them about different topics _ for example glass_blowing, cooking and sewing. They also have competitions, for example this year, they have entered the Leek Show, where there is a theme of any song title. They have chosen 'Shine on Harvest Moon'. They have to do four different handicrafts and four types of cooking to go with the song.
